data: If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Always face forward. Take 9 steps left. Take 10 steps forward. Take 9 steps right. Take 10 steps backward. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.

While facing forward, take 9 steps left, take 10 steps forward, take 9 steps right, and take 10 steps backward. If you want to face backwards, take 10 steps backward. There are no shortcuts that can get you back in the starting point. So, the answer is no.
